mapper.insert: INSERT INTO friend (id, requester_id, receiver_id, status) VALUES (#{id}, #{requesterId}, #{receiverId}, 'PENDING')
mapper.select: SELECT id, requester_id, receiver_id, status, created_at, accepted_at FROM friend WHERE (requester_id = #{userId} OR receiver_id = #{userId}) AND status = 'ACCEPTED'
SELECT id, requester_id, receiver_id, status, created_at, accepted_at FROM friend WHERE receiver_id = #{userId} AND status = 'PENDING'
mapper.update: UPDATE friend SET status = #{status}, accepted_at = CASE WHEN #{status} = 'ACCEPTED' THEN NOW() ELSE NULL END WHERE id = #{friendId}
